channel.title: [PI] Models
channel.description:
I've just added some models..
The Blue Santa Hat doesn't have an inventory image.. The Master Capes inventory images are big coloured squares - guessing it's to do with the rotation,zoom and offset numbers.
When wearing them it doesn't show on the player. When dropping them it shows the wield ID.
?
